text: Harry Volkman (April 18, 1926 - August 20, 2015) was an American meteorologist. He was the first weatherman to issue a tornado warning. He retired in 2004. He was born in Medford, Massachusetts. He won three Emmy Awards.(PDF) Volkman died from respiratory failure in Des Plaines, Illinois, aged 89. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Scientists from Chicago Category:Scientists from Massachusetts Category:Scientists from Oklahoma Category:People from Medford, Massachusetts
title: Harry Volkman
